title: New: Molly Beanland – Real Life
body:
Wasn’t completely sold on this new **Molly Beanland** track on the first couple of listens, however after a few more it really hit me.

This is some Cocteau Twins vibes brought into a glitzy, twenty first centre perspective; on the edge at all times, and ultimately, rather fantastic. It’s sensual, danceable and 80’s disco sounding. Check out _Real Life_ below.

It’s sensual, danceable and 80’s disco sounding. \[…\]
